description: Returns the data available for the group.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization under which the group exists.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The identifier for the group to be described. The identifier can accept GroupId, Groupname, or email. The following identity formats are available: Group ID: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: group@domain.tld Group name: group.

nested_items.name: GroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the described group.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the described group.

nested_items.name: Email
nested_items.description: The email of the described group.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the user: enabled (registered to WorkMail) or disabled (deregistered or never registered to WorkMail).

nested_items.name: EnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when a user was registered to WorkMail, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: DisabledDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when a user was deregistered from WorkMail, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: HiddenFromGlobalAddressList
nested_items.description: If the value is set to true, the group is hidden from the address book.
